T02D3221:223b-1: pradzny'a pa ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3221:223b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3221:223b-4: 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3221:223b-5: de nas gang zhig bsgoms tsam gyis /
T02D3221:223b-6: rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par //
T02D3221:223b-7: shes rab pha rol phyin 'byung ba //
T02D3221:223b-8: de phyir bdag gis rab bshad bya //
T02D3221:223b-9: zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste //
T02D3221:223b-10: kha dog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3221:223b-11: dbu skra phyed phyed 'khyil ba dang //
T02D3221:223b-12: pad dkar la ni legs bzhugs pa'ang //
T02D3221:223b-13: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs //
T02D3221:223b-14: padma g-yas pa'i phyag na dang //
T02D3221:223b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i g-yon //
T02D3221:223b-16: kha dog dmar mo rnam par bsgom //
T02D3221:223b-17: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs nas//
T02D3221:223b-18: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsgom bya //
T02D3221:223b-19: aam yig ye shes las legs byang //
T02D3221:223b-20: mchog tu mtha' yas dga' byed ma'o //
T02D3221:223b-21: dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs byas la //
T02D3221:223b-22: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya //
T02D3221:223b-23: zla drug sbyor ba goms pa yis //
T02D3221:223b-24: shes rab pha rol phyin mar 'gyur //
T02D3221:223b-25: zhag bdun na ni rab sbyor bas //
T02D3221:223b-27: 'bum phrag bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3221:223b-28: nyin re tshigs bcad brgyad brgya byed //
T02D3221:223b-29: rab tu brtson pa dag gis kyang //
T02D3221:223b-30: gzhung ni brgya yang 'dzin par byed //
T02D3221:223b-31: 'di la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa rnams ni /
T02D3221:223b-32: aom pi tsu pi cu pra dzny'a bardha ni dzva
T02D3221:223b-33: la me dha bardha ni dhi ri dhi ri budhi
T02D3221:223b-34: bardha ni sv'a h'a sngags 'dis ma stsal ba'i sbrang
T02D3221:224a-1: lan bdun mngon par bsngags nas ji srid zla ba
T02D3221:224a-2: drug gi bar du sbu gus 'thungs pas shes rab
T02D3221:224a-4: aom pi sv'a h'a sngags 'di la yang mi bskyod pas rgyas gdab par bya ba yin no //
T02D3221:224a-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs so //
T02D3221:224a-6: pandi ta chen po ma la ba zhes bya ba
T02D3221:224a-7: dha byang chub sems dpa'i zhal snga nas dge slong
